page.title: 09THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 8
page.content: {What they would like to see in Marks {Tey.}Most people (43) would like to see something done about the roads - either a by pass or a speed limit. other things included more facilities for teenagers,a chemist,a doctor's surgery,playing area on the estate, more participation in school life,new village hall or community centre,more sport facilities,more social activities and no more built up areas. (K.Robson & K.Cornell) {PASTIMES - ADULTS We have found out that the most popular{pastimes}for females is{ gardening{(32.5%)}For males it is the second most popular{(42.5%)}The most popular{pastime}for men was sports and games{(45%)}and for the ladies it was second along with watching T.V{(27.5%) For males watching T.V is the third most popular pastime{(22.5%) }Other
